name: Five Nights at Slender's DEMO
description:
The local amusement park has a new project that is making an impression on people. A horror house with animatronic robots inside. One day, you decide to take a job as a night security guard, which you should never have done ...

Fan-made of Scott Cawthon's hit game series.

Credits: Scott Cawthon, Emil Macko, Tanfor Dev ...
